entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Implement DevDeviceId generation and transmission #42804
    9.0.1xx
  • dotnet-watch - using Process.Kill(false) hangs tests on Linux/OSx #44496
  • Application Crash when libpng is installed on the system macOS Sequoia #44425

Updated

  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Analyzer for redundant NuGet packages #44533
  • CS8785 error after updating from 8.0.304 to 8.0.306 SDK #44145
  • Regression with package restore: RID Graph not respected when selecting native library from nuget package #4195
  • Building with SDK 8.0.403 unexpectedly generates WinRT-related code #44026
  • Could not copy the file deps.json because it was not found. Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets 4919 #17645
    Backlog
  • The Visual Studio version displays incorrectly on the SDK installer page. #44360
  • dotnet compiler crashes when compiling inside a sandbox #31668
  • .NET to COM/ActiveX - params/ParamArray not supported for VB98/VB6 and earlier #44460
  • Winforms/WPF .NET9.0 app cannot be ran on Windows 10 20H2(OS build 19042.2965) #43115

PullRequests

Created

  • Browser refresh and WASM delta applier refactoring #44539
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/9.0.2xx] add `dotnet new sln --format slnx` #44538
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-list: Support for slnx #44537
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Don't force base image manifests to have a mediaType #44530
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add MSTest among common workloads #44523
    untriaged

Merged

  • add `dotnet new sln --format slnx` #44469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [ADD] dotnet solution migrate #44419
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44212
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Rename the source build SmokeTests to just source build tests #44514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Better structure VMR join points for resolvers #44428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • [FIX] tool-update: Compare tool versions correctly #44517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Gather test diag logging to track down nuget issue #44455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [FIX] tool-install: Use RestoreActionConfig options #44487
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
